abstract: Washington Redskins president Bruce Allen confirms team will part ways with quarterback Robert Griffin III; other pro football news noted.
lead_paragraph: If there had been any doubt about Robert Griffin III’s future with Washington, Bruce Allen, the team’s president, made the future perfectly clear.

headline.main: Redskins Say Griffin Will Not Return
headline.print_headline: Redskins Say Griffin Will Not Return

snippet: If there had been any doubt about Robert Griffin III’s future with Washington, Bruce Allen, the team’s president, made the future perfectly clear.
